revised_title: Observations on Hunting Techniques and Local Fauna in Ceylon
tldr: The author, Mr. Strachan, describes various hunting methods used in Ceylon, including techniques for catching birds, deer, and other animals. He also provides information on local serpent species, the behavior of the ant bear, and the cultivation and uses of cinnamon. Additionally, he mentions the lack of traditional use of cinnamon in Ceylon and its potential medicinal properties.
